mapper.sql: SELECT EXP.MERID,EXP.GOODSID,EXP.AMOUNT,INF.GOODSNAME,INF.SERVTYPE,EXP.CATEGORY AS GOODCATEGORY FROM UMPAY.T_HFGOODS_EXP EXP JOIN UMPAY.T_GOODS_INF INF ON EXP.MERID=INF.MERID AND EXP.GOODSID=INF.GOODSID WHERE 1=1 #if( $merId && $merId!='' ) AND EXP.MERID LIKE '$merId%' #end #if( $goodsId && $goodsId!='' ) AND EXP.GOODSID=:goodsId #end ORDER BY EXP.MERID,EXP.GOODSID
